welcome_message_body: Welcome to Trondheim, a charming city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cafe Løkka
restaurants.description: Cafe Løkka is a café located in Trondheim.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Værnes Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orland Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Orland Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
